mapper.update: UPDATE member SET memNickName = #{memNickName}, memHP = #{memHP}, memZipcode = #{memZipcode}, memAddress1 = #{memAddress1}, memAddress2 = #{memAddress2}, filtering = #{filtering}, profile_image=#{profile_image} WHERE memId = #{memId};
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, a.petCtgName FROM pet p LEFT JOIN animal_ctg a ON p.petCtgNo = a.petCtgNo WHERE p.memId = #{memId}

SELECT bb.postTitle, bb.postDate, bb.memId AS author, ph.headerName, bp.bookmarkDate FROM bookmark_post bp INNER JOIN bulletin_board bb ON bp.postNo = bb.postNo INNER JOIN postheader ph ON bb.headerNo = ph.headerNo WHERE bp.memId = #{memId} ORDER BY bp.bookmarkDate DESC;

SELECT bb.postTitle, bb.postDate, bb.memId AS author, ph.headerName, bp.bookmarkDate FROM bookmark_post bp INNER JOIN bulletin_board bb ON bp.postNo = bb.postNo INNER JOIN postheader ph ON bb.headerNo = ph.headerNo WHERE bp.memId = #{memId} AND bb.headerNo = #{headerNo} ORDER BY bp.bookmarkDate DESC;

SELECT bb.postTitle, bb.postDate, bb.memId AS author, ph.headerName, bp.bookmarkDate FROM bookmark_post bp INNER JOIN bulletin_board bb ON bp.postNo = bb.postNo INNER JOIN postheader ph ON bb.headerNo = ph.headerNo WHERE bp.memId = #{memId}
AND (bb.postTitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContents}, '%') OR bb.postContent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContents}, '%'))
AND bb.postTitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContents}, '%')
AND bb.postContent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContents}, '%')
AND bb.memId LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContents}, '%')
AND 1=1
ORDER BY bp.bookmarkDate DESC

SELECT pg.postTitle, pg.postLike, pg.postImg, pg.memId AS author, mb.profile_image, bg.bookmarkDate FROM bookmark_gallery bg INNER JOIN pet_gallery pg ON bg.postNo = pg.postNo INNER JOIN member mb ON pg.memId = mb.memId WHERE bg.memId = #{memId} ORDER BY bg.bookmarkDate DESC;

SELECT bl.blocker_memId, bl.blocked_memId, bl.block_date, bl.block_reason, mb.memNickName FROM block_list bl INNER JOIN member mb ON bl.blocked_memId = mb.memId WHERE bl.blocker_memId = #{memId} ORDER BY bl.block_date DESC;
